name: Tarrata Demo
description:
Welcome to Tarrata!

Take the role of Tarrock and go on a journey of a lifetime. Meet all sorts of new friends and explore the pond and surrounding area, collect all 78 cards of a Tarot deck, and use the arcane magicks of the sword, cups, wand, and pentacle to solve puzzles and fight enemies.

In this beta demo, there is a single level with a few early mechanics to explore. QA Test Applications are open to play versions as they come out and provide feedback here.

Tarrata 0.25: Demo

Website: http://tarrata-game.com/main.html
Twitter: @TarrataG
Join the Discord!
